targets.query: SELECT sum("Confirmed") -sum(Recovered)-sum(Deaths) FROM "CoronaNew" WHERE ("country" =~ /^$Country$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time(24h) fill(null)
SELECT sum("Deaths") *100 / sum("Confirmed") FROM "covid19"."autogen"."Corona" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
SELECT sum("Recovered") * 100 / sum("Confirmed" FROM "covid19"."autogen"."Corona" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time(24h) fill(null)
SELECT sum("Confirmed") FROM "covid19"."autogen"."Corona" WHERE ("country" = 'Germany') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time(24h), "country" fill(null)

SELECT last("Deaths") FROM "covid19"."autogen"."Corona" WHERE ("country" = 'Germany' OR "country" = 'Italy' OR "country" = 'Poland' OR "country" = 'Spain') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time(24h), "country" fill(null)

SELECT last("Deaths") FROM "covid19"."autogen"."Corona" WHERE ("country" = 'Germany' OR "country" = 'Italy' OR "country" = 'Poland' OR "country" = 'Spain') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time(24h), "country" fill(null)
